subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r22370 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0_25/source: .
	include libads libsmb
body:
Hi Guenther, Jerry!

On Thu, Apr 19, 2007 at 04:53:34PM +0200, Guenther Deschner wrote:
> Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
> >gd@samba.org wrote:
> >>
> >>Log:
> >>Merge -r21777:21779 from 3_0 to fix the build with Heimdal 0.8.
> >Guenther,  Timur (FreeBSD) is saying that we cannot build with
> >Heimdal 0.6.3 anymore.  Can you confirm and explain if this wa a
> >necessary change?
> 
> Yep, this broke. I just test the fix.

I've tried svn r22440 under FreeBSD and seems, problem disappeared - I was
able to compile Samba3 with the system wide Heimdal 0.6.3.

Thanks a lot for fixing it so quickly!

With best regards,
Timur.
